name: My first Kishoutenketsu
description:
I've made a game with Puzzlescript based on the chinese and japanese narrative structure named Kishoutenketsu. It isn't a difficult game, it just wants to tell a small story with simple mechanics and orange fishes.

Use the arrows to move.

Press Z to cancel your last action.

Press R to restart if you are blocked.

Have a nice play !

===

If you enjoyed the game and can afford it, please consider donating : this game is free but your help would be very appreciated for me to continue making things in the future :)

===

If you want to follow my future things, you can follow me on Twitter : @HeskHwis
